main event: Two bright lights were observed traveling at high speed in Roswell, New Mexico in March 1957.
interesting points: The lights were circular with a brilliant yellow color and reddish tint,The objects came to an abrupt halt in air traffic and appeared stationary for about one minute,The lights then continued southwest at tremendous speed and disappeared to the northeast,A pilot in a C-47 noticed three bright lights on a collision course,When the pilot flashed his taxi lights, the objects blacked out and disappeared from sight.
witness description: A pilot observed the lights from a C-47 aircraft.
